mapper.sql: id, year, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, type, fuel_type, holdings, use_hours, fuel_annual_usage, fuel_sulfur_content, annal_average_mileage, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, vocs_emission, bc_emission, oc_emission, nh3_emission
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from small_machinery
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into small_machinery (id, year, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, type, fuel_type, holdings, use_hours, fuel_annual_usage, fuel_sulfur_content, annal_average_mileage, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, vocs_emission, bc_emission, oc_emission, nh3_emission ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{holdings,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useHours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelSulfurContent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{annalAverageMileage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )

update small_machinery
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{record.year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
scc_code = #{record.sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{record.sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
